PolicyName.description: The name identifying the policy document to delete. This parameter allows (per its regex pattern) a string of characters consisting of upper and lowercase alphanumeric characters with no spaces. You can also include any of the following characters: =,.@-

UserName.description: The name (friendly name, not ARN) identifying the user that the policy is embedded in. This parameter allows (per its regex pattern) a string of characters consisting of upper and lowercase alphanumeric characters with no spaces. You can also include any of the following characters: =,.@-
